title: Caesar 3
notes: Mouse does not work to move screen down or right.

title: Caesar™ 3
notes: Game works. Unable to scroll the map right or down making it unplayable. Graphics become broken in windowed mode.
Mouse scrolling issues, keyboard works. Switching to windowed breaks rendering.
title: Caesar™ 3

notes: Game works normally, I completed first couple of missions. I was able to save without issues. Windowed mode is broken the same way as it is on win version. Widescreen patch is working, look for it on Caesar Discussions page on Steam.
title: Caesar™ 3

notes: Upon launch runs fine, but the edge scrolling down and edge scrolling right don't work. Using the 1920x1080 HD mod fixes scrolling issues for me: https://www.moddb.com/mods/caesar-3-full-hd
title: Caesar™ 3
